name: Five Nights At Sonic's Maniac Mania Minus
name_original: Five Nights At Sonic's Maniac Mania Minus
description:
Five Nights At Sonic's Maniac Mania Minus is a game developed by Ionnizer. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Five Nights At Sonic's Maniac Mania Minus on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
